description:
Protect yourself and others while in crowded spaces or while social distancing. This double-layer mask fully covers your nose, mouth and chin to help prevent the spread of droplets. The washable design keeps them fresh.

  • 2 layers of tightly woven cotton fabric meet CDC requirements
  • Nose stiffener and elastic ear loops hold mask in place
  • Pleats expand for a custom fit
  • Small fits youth or smaller adults. Medium fits average adult faces. Large fits fuller adult faces
  • Hand-washable
name: Coal The Pleated Face Mask - Unisex
